text: Maryland's 8th congressional district is in Montgomery County, with a small portion in Prince George's County. The district is near Washington, D.C.. The 8th district takes in many of the cityâ€™s wealthiest inner-ring suburbs, including Bethesda, Chevy Chase, and Potomac. It also includes Rockville and Silver Spring. Democrat Jamie Raskin has represented the seat since 2017. ==References== Category:Congressional districts of Maryland
title: Maryland's 8th congressional district
